insert into tProject(sTitle, sDescription, dtStart, dtEnd, nHeadcount,sArchitecture, sErd, sMainFunction, sInterest, sGithub, bIsPublic) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{headcount}, #{architecture}, #{erd}, #{mainFunction}, #{interest}, #{github}, #{isPublic})

mapper.select: select nProjectSeq as seq, sTitle as title, sDescription as description, dtStart as start, dtEnd as end, nHeadcount as headcount, sArchitecture as architecture, sErd as erd, sMainfunction as mainFunction, sInterest as interest, sGithub as github, bIsPublic as isPublic, dtCreatedAt as createdAt from tProject where nProjectSeq = #{seq}
